document_data.name: Gandolar Luckyfoot
document_data.mainbody:
'''Gandolar Luckyfoot''' was the leader of the [[halfling]] community of [[Gullykin]] ''circa'' the late 1360s [[DR]].

{{Quote|Well met, traveler. Gandolar Luckyfoot, at your disposal. To what does our little village owe the pleasure of your visit?|Gandolar, to visitors of Gullykin.}}
document_data.Personality: He was a warm and welcoming individual that appreciated good manners and treating others in a polite manner.
document_data.Activities: Gandolar and his fellows in Gullykin often lent their aid to those [[adventurer]]s that sought to prove themselves in the depths of the nearby [[Durlag's Tower]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, the folk of Gullykin suffered regular raids by [[kobold]]s led by an [[ogre mage]] that originated from the ruins of the [[Firewine Bridge]]. Gandolar sought out adventurers to keep safe his people and help their village remain free from harm.
